name: Night and Day The curse of the red witch
detailed_description:
Night & Day action game, adventures and platforms for a player or local cooperative, in which you control two characters simultaneously.
• Tribute to classic arcade games of skill and precision.
• Simple control system and a camera system that will provide you with a cinematic experience.
• Local cooperative experience with new added challenges.
• Activate the magic seals with various effects that will be of great help in your mission.
• Test your reflexes by fighting against fearsome bosses and minibosses.
• Challenging adventure marked by the narrative.
• Discover the beautiful and diverse environments of the world of Celuria.







Once upon a time, in another world, in another place, in another time.
Live the journey of Colwyn and Lyssa, condemned to always be together and eternally separated by a curse. Overcome multiple challenges and multiple enemies, touring the fantastic world of Celuria and discover the mystery behind the curse facing the red witch and its fearsome generals.
Can you break the curse?
